reviews.review: This game is honestly my favorite shooter game its full of competition and is very skill based which is awesome for anyone and always means theres room for improvement.
Look up Esports and you see this game.

A VER SI DEJAN DE SACAR ACTUALIZACION DE MIERDA QUE BAJAN EL RENDIMIENTO DEL JUEGO Y SE PONEN A OPTIMIZARLO QUE PARECE QUE A ESO SE LO PASARON POR EL CENTRO DEL ORTO, CADA VEZ QUE QUIERO ENTRAR A UNA PARTIDA ME BANEAN POR NO PODER ENTRAR YA QUE NO OPTIMIZAN ESTE JUEGO DEL ORTO Y ME ANDA PARA LA MIERDA
Just buy prime and you won't regret it, play with friends, dont have any? dont worry because you could join a comp gain and make 4 new teammates to link with

From CS 1.6 to CSGO Its been an amazing journey!
low skill floor but very high skill ceiling, lots to learn but its fun to watch your progress.
rush b with your team or get flamed

games good although every teammate i get matched up against in matchmaking plays with their feet.

The best skill based shooter. There's a reason it has been around so long.

Been apart of CS for 17 years or so. Definitely an amazing game. Only issue has been hackers. Just never have been able to grasp them.
please do not waste your time on this game. I would rather take part in CBT also know as COCK AND BALL TORTURE which is the act of...

Classic gameplay I've enjoyed my whole adult life.  Competitive community is relatively drama-free.

Native Linux support has not been good as of late, and I haven't been able to play CS:GO for nearly three months as a result.
Good game! Find some friends and avoid the huge waves of hackers and you will have a blast. Also, I recommend hide and seek :)

muito bom pena que tem hack
Great game super fun to play! And its free to play!
It would be a fun game without hackers

I do recommend the game, but the likelihood of playing against hackers/cheats is massive, especially now that it's free.
having said that, it can be a way of improving your game, or making you understand how slight the chances are that you might go pro.

seriously, only two nzers so far..?
jogo Leve e bom desde sempre
great game well built and will last plenty of more years.

while the game definitely isn't in its prime and the community is toxic its a fun game to slowly watch your skill progress as you get better and better and its a blast with friends and can actually be fun by yourself sometimes but not always due to some of the bots u may find yourself matched with
